name: HomeTV
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Home TV”
”Alexa, turn off the Home TV”
”Alexa, turn the volume up on Home TV”
skdetail:
Video Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Home TV Android TV box has intelligent voice function, which allow you to turn on/off, mute/unmute, and adjust the volume, search, play/pause, fast-forward and rewind, videos and much more. Make it easy and more fun to enjoy your Home TV Android TV box.
To use this Skill with Alexa, you must log in go to Alexa voice assistant app and search for skill Home TV. Then you get the voice assistant account information provided by the Home TV Android TV box to log in the skill in the Alexa voice assistant app, afterwards you are ready to starting using your Alexa with the Home TV Android TV box.
This skill is only works with Smart Speaker from the Echo series (Echo Dot 3ª Generation, Echo Dot 4ª generation, Echo Show 8 1ª generation, Echo Show 8 2ª generation, Echo Studio, Echo Show 5 2ª generation and Echo Show 10).
